ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Connect time?
ygData.msgSnippet: A few servers have been running a few emergencies patches. Maybe the login server was laged due to folks from these servers trying to login.
ygData.messageBody:
A few servers have been running a few emergencies patches. Maybe the login
server was laged due to folks from these servers trying to login.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 20, 2001 2:47 PM
> To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Connect time?
>
> Is it just me, or is it taking longer and longer to connect? I couldn't
> even get past the login screen for 5 or 10 minutes. Kept saying that it
> couldn't connect to login server. Never had that happen unless it was
> down
> for a patch (which it wasn't). Also noticed that the times when I choose
> my server, and going to the character screen, and the time from the
> character screen to the game are much longer.
>
> I'm running a Celeron 533 w/ 185 MB ram, windows ME a cable modem, and
> about 2GB of drive space for windows to write to. Any suggestions?
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
